did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Observations, Elements of the Orbit and Emphemeris of Swift's Comet, 1892, and Pleiades, 1899 1892-1899
did.abstract: Holograph observations by Milton Updegraff of Swift's Comet after its 1892 discovery. Includes 1898 chart of Trails of Leonid Meteors; also a section of observations of the stars in the Pleiades group, made from the Laws Observatory, University of Missouri, 1899.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Observations, Elements of the Orbit and Emphemeris of Swift's Comet, 1892, and Pleiades, 1899 (MS 264). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Astronomer, professor, and director of the Observatory at the University of Missouri, 1890-1899.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph observations by Milton Updegraff of Swift's Comet after its 1892 discovery. Includes 1898 chart of Trails of Leonid Meteors; also a section of observations of the stars in the Pleiades group, made from the Laws Observatory, University of Missouri, 1899.
